text:

14 - Aguero 
11 - Costa 
9 - Sanchez 
8 - Austin 
7 - Sakho, Bony, Cisse, Berahino http://t.co/JDphvOXv7A

MOST #BPL GOALS IN 2014: 
19 - Bony 
18 - Aguero 
15 - Yaya Toure 
14 - Dzeko http://t.co/LL7Xeaxqs6
Villa 2-1 Leicester: @AVFCOfficial stretch their #BPL unbeaten run to 5 matches. Report: http://t.co/pIHXFXoiry http://t.co/qoYddnTyKd
WATCH Sam Allardyce on another @whufc_official win: "It was tremendous character from the players." http://t.co/RhWb7dJCEG
TABLE With Matchweek 15 nearly over, this is the state of play in the Barclays Premier League... #BPL http://t.co/lkj89S1uki
Here's a look back at the weekend scores in the #BPL - reports and reaction at http://t.co/5XVaYnilyk http://t.co/NQs3nMApt0
One more to go in Matchweek 15 - and it's 4th against 5th at St Mary's. Preview: http://t.co/KF91s8GHdD http://t.co/3625LhfgvC
ON THIS DAY in 2007, Portsmouth rose to 5th in the #BPL thanks to some @MuntariOfficial magic: http://t.co/bJMIZCsEBF http://t.co/T0mZVZQC68
WATCH "Hutton is playing as well as anybody in the country at right-back" - Paul Lambert looks back on AVL 2-1 LEI http://t.co/XEONtLKUIC
#BPL clubs created "A Moment in History" this weekend. Did you? http://t.co/gELva2ooTz #FootballRemembers http://t.co/QJWjdVwoKq
.@AndyTCarroll's performance on Sunday was one of his best for West Ham, says Allardyce. More: http://t.co/oMVUX1mQ1c http://t.co/iZP6RTLoX6
"Normally Man Utd are favourites but they know it'll be tough" - Koeman looks ahead to #SOUMUN http://t.co/6YIoGkdwHB http://t.co/e5MJbSVybW
.@CPFC will offer one of India's young footballers the "chance of a lifetime" at #BPLLive: http://t.co/WUE9L9792R http://t.co/2Ar0Q25ltN
Referee appointments have been made for #BPL Matchweek 16 (13-15 Dec). See full list: http://t.co/eRjFmKiXvt
3 HOURS TO GO till @SouthamptonFC host @ManUtd. Who'll win? Visit the http://t.co/w3EwiAn4W2 homepage to vote #SOUMUN http://t.co/n4T6H8YVvX
History will be made in the Barclays Premier League on Monday... http://t.co/asUuzgXSZR #SOUMUN
LIVE NOW The build-up to #SOUMUN has begun and @Stevo_football needs you to talk to him... http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN http://t.co/SkR0CSqTHu

Southampton v Man Utd - who wins?

VOTE NOW at http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN #SOUMUN
TEAM NEWS Saints bring in Maya Yoshida and Sadio Mane for Toby Alderweireld and Jack Cork #SOUMUN

TEAM NEWS Two changes for @ManUtd with @WayneRooney & Paddy McNair replacing Ander Herrara & James Wilson #SOUMUN 
http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN
There've been many classics between @SouthamptonFC and @ManUtd over the years - including this 9-goal stunner http://t.co/g4EBtlDsbl

The #FACup Third Round draw will see 4 all-#BPL ties:
Arsenal v Hull City
Burnley v Spurs
Everton v West Ham
Leicester v Newcastle
CHASING SHADOWS But will @SouthamptonFC or @ManUtd be 3rd at full-time? Follow: http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN #SOUMUN http://t.co/KEWzfdQReD
KICK OFF The final contest of Matchweek 15 is under way. It's @SouthamptonFC v @ManUtd. Follow: http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN #SOUMUN
GOAL Southampton 0-1 Man Utd (12 mins). Robin van Persie latches on to Jose Fonte's back pass and slides the ball home #SOUMUN
SUB @ManUtd are forced into an early change as Chris Smalling is replaced by Jonny Evans. Southampton 0-1 Man Utd (17 mins) #SOUMUN
PHOTO @Persie_Official puts @ManUtd ahead at St Mary's. It's Southampton 0-1 Man Utd (23 mins) #SOUMUN http://t.co/yMhrhD4PS8
GOAL Southampton 1-1 Man Utd (31 mins). Graziano Pelle hammers in from close range after Dusan Tadic's shot is blocked #SOUMUN
SUB @ManUtd bring on Ander Herrera for Paddy McNailr on 39 mins. Southampton 1-1 Man Utd #SOUMUN
HALF-TIME Southampton 1-1 Man Utd. @GPelle19 levels after @Persie_Official's opener for the visitors #SOUMUN http://t.co/tHGdSc9Ode
The second-half begins at St Mary's. Follow the @Carlsberg Live Match Centre with @Stevo_football: http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN
FOOTBALL REMEMBERS All weekend, clubs have been creating "A Moment in History"... More: http://t.co/gELva2ooTz http://t.co/Eci15W0VJy
NET GAIN But will @GPelle19's equaliser be the last goal in #SOUMUN? It's 1-1 - follow at http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN http://t.co/kdzFCNXdYW
GOAL Southampton 1-2 Man Utd (71 mins). Wayne Rooney crosses deep and Robin van Persie steals in at the far post to finish #SOUMUN
SUB Shane Long is replaced by Emmanuel Mayuka in the 79th minute. Southampton 1-2 Man Utd (80 mins) #SOUMUN
PHOTO Robin van Persie's 2nd of the match restores @ManUtd's lead. Will they hold on? Follow http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN http://t.co/iXWA3zExZt
SUB Juan Mata is replaced in the 89th minute, with Darren Fletcher coming on. Southampton 1-2 Man Utd #SOUMUN
We are into four minutes of added time at St Mary's. Late drama? Southampton 1-2 Man Utd #SOUMUN
FULL-TIME Southampton 1-2 Man Utd. Robin van Persie's double makes it 5 #BPL wins in a row for @ManUtd, who go 3rd http://t.co/6wZKX9nONh
TABLE @ManUtd are up to 3rd. How high can they go? Tell @Stevo_football at the Match Centre: http://t.co/5vCtFIZrwN http://t.co/J24mANp6ZJ
Man Utd goalscorer @Persie_Official: "I don't think we played our best today, we were a bit sloppy... but in the end we nicked it." #SOUMUN
Saints boss Ronald Koeman: "We played attacking football... It's important not to make mistakes. We made 2 & Van Persie was the difference."

TOP #BPL SCORERS:
Aguero 14
Costa 11
Sanchez 9
Austin 8
Berahino, Bony, Cisse, Pelle, Sakho 7 http://t.co/8rALeABXPV
Man Utd boss Louis van Gaal: "Southampton played better than us, but we were the lucky guy today." #SOUMUN http://t.co/RrDR2Pp9mU
